title: Their Arrows Enrage (1C141)
text:
Set:	The Fellowship of the Ring
Kind:	Shadow
Culture:	Isengard
Twilight:	1
Card Type:	Condition
Game Text:	To play, spot Saruman or an Uruk-hai. Plays to your support area. Each archer companion and archer ally is strength -1.
Lore:	The ferocious charge of the Uruk-hai catches enemy archers groping for their swords.
Rarity:	C
